channel.title: Attempting to host a server
channel.description:
Hello, im currently working on a new private server called "Hurtscape" which i am going to be hosting again this will probably be completed and up and running in a week or so.But in the mean time i am looking for some staff members who are expierenced with helping me run the server while i am not on. On this server I Plan to have a stable economy easy money making and lots of pking also all skills will be working and new items will be added to the server and if i get enough people playing ill buy "Dedicated server" to make the hosting alot better. Im looking for 1 admin and 2 moderators who will be dedicated too playing and getting players on and helping them.If i do not find people that are interested in helping me this project will fail so please help me.
[b]Contact me:[/b] my email is Hurtful2213@aol.com
or just message me on here.. and ill get back to you asap!! thanks

item.title: Attempting to host a server
item.dc:creator: @Strong2213 Strong2213
item.description:

Hello, im currently working on a new private server called “Hurtscape” which i am going to be hosting again this will probably be completed and up and running in a week or so.But in the mean time i am looking for some staff members who are expierenced with helping me run the server while i am not on.
